mapper.select:
select a.id, a.auth_config_id authConfigId, a.auth_type authType, ROUND(a.personal_max_amount/10000,2) personalMaxAmount, ROUND(a.enterprise_max_amount/10000,2) enterpriseMaxAmount, a.auth_period authPeriod, a.enabled_status enabledStatus, b.truename createUserStr, a.create_time createTime, a.ip, a.mac, a.remark from ht_hjh_user_auth_config_log a left join ht_admin b on a.create_user_id = b.id order by a.create_time desc
limit #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}
